= Conflict =
Defines the basic object of conflicts between files.

  * FolderConflict,
  * FileConflict,
  * FolderVSFileConflict,
  * FileVSFolderConflict,
  * FolderVSSubFolderConflict,
  * SubFolderVSFolderConflict
 * *enum UserChoice*

  * KeepUSBUpdates

  * Modified
  * Deleted

 * *string Name*
 * *bool USBSelected*
 * *bool PCSelected*
